Text: You'd think something like this would have a thousand seeds and tons of thanks.
Thank you for this, please seed!!!! I will continue to do so after it's done!

I really love this series and remember it from childhood. It's too bad that all of the complete sets are such monster size files. These films were shot on old B&W stock in the 40's with a monoaural soundtrack. Each ~27 minute episode fits nicely in under 70MB with acceptable size, frame rate, and audio using H264/Lame codec. So the entire series should fit in 1.8GB easily. Instead I see sets ranging from 5.8GB to 23.5GB! what - Blue-Ray 1080P from 1945?
Just too big for my puny connection. If I can ever get a good, complete set like this one, I'll chop it down to size while maintaining watchability. Thanks to the uploader, though.

Thank you very much for this. I will seed for a
week or so.
It'd be nice to have these WITHOUT being badly interlaced, it's very annoying.  As it is, it's not worth the download unless of course you don't mind badly interlaced video.
